ewakata widuhalpathi dhuraya isiluwe ti. bi. damunupola mahatha ya.nepalaye kandu tharanaya pilibanda wishesha puhunuwak labu ajith jayasekara mahatha ge manga penwima yatathe arambaunu kandu tharanaya 2008 wasara wana wita dasa wathawak sidu kirimata aananda kandu tharana kandayama samath wiya.mansalakunume harunu wita pasugiyada kala kandutharanaya wisheshayen sandahan kala hakke shitha sruthuwe ewarast kandu panthiye kalapatha iwura tharanaya kala pa‡∑ärathama kandayama bawata path wannata ema kandayamata haki wima nisaya.suwisheshi man salakunu sanituhan kala me kandu tharanaye anek wisheshathwaya kandu tharanayata sahabhagi wu pirisata widuhalpathiwarayaku da athulath wimayi.ee diwayine pa‡∑äramukha bodu widuhala lesa peramune sitina aananda widuhale widuhalpathi bi. ee. aberathna mahathaya.mema warthawa pihituwimata sisu pirisa samaga aanandaye widuhalpathiwaraya da ekwima kandu tharanaya kala guru sisu kandayamata imahath dhairyayak wiya.ewarast tharanayata sahabhagi wu kandayamata widuhalpathithuma, mejar jagath alwis (puhunukaru ha bhara aacharya) dabliw.

thawada, samindanan wahanse wana oba me senanga mada wada wasana bawath, oba owunta muhunata muhuna la penena bawath, obage lakuna wana walakula owunta ihalin randa sitina bawath, oba owunta peratuwa, dawal kalaye di wala tambaak mangin da, rathri kalaye di gini tambaak mangin da wadama karana bawath owun asa atha. 15 dan ithin, oba wahanse owun samulaghathanaya karana sek nam, oba wahansege kirthiya gana asu jathihu katha kota, 16 ‚Äòsamindanan wahanse owunta diwura porondu wu deshayata owun genennata nohaki wu bawin, un wahanse owun palukaraye di maradamu seka‚Äôyi kiyannaha. 17-18 oba wadara athi paridi, samindanan wahanse wana oba pahasuwen nokipena sulu ya, imahath se daya pana seka, adamitukam ha napurukam kama karana seka, waradikaruta danduwam nokara noharina seka, piyawarunge damitukam nisa owunge daru munuburanta thun wana hathara wana paramparawa dakwa danduwam karana seka.
